faqs.heading: Frequently Asked Questions About Christmas Party Glam

questions.question: What is the 'Fighting With Santa' effect?
questions.answer: The 'Fighting With Santa' effect is an AI effect that turns your photo into a short, fun video. After you upload an image, the AI creates an action-style animation where it looks like you’re playfully fighting with Santa.

questions.question: Is the 'Fighting With Santa' effect free to try?
questions.answer: Yes, you can try the effect for free. When you sign up for an account, you get free credits that you can use to create this effect and explore other AI video effects.

questions.question: Is my photo safe when I upload it?
questions.answer: Yes, your photo is completely safe. It is uploaded securely, used only to create the video effect, and then removed from our servers after a short time. Nothing is shared with anyone.

questions.question: What image formats can I upload?
questions.answer: You can upload common formats like JPEG, PNG, or WEBP. Just make sure the file size fits within the upload limit shown on the page.

questions.question: Do I need to install anything to use this effect?
questions.answer: No, you don’t need to install anything. This effect works completely online, and you can use it from any device with a web browser.

steps.title: Upload an Image
bulletPoints: Upload a photo of yourself or anyone else. Make sure the image is clear and high-quality to get the best Fighting With Santa result.

steps.title: Apply Fighting With Santa Effect and Generate
bulletPoints: Once your image is uploaded, click the “Apply Fighting With Santa” button. The AI will smoothly apply the Fighting With Santa transformation to your photo.

steps.title: Preview and Download It
bulletPoints: After the process is complete, you can preview the Fighting With Santa transformation and download it to your device or share it.
